DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate antioxidant effect Plantago asiatica L. extract subject mild hyperlipidemia .
DOC.brief_title: Antioxidative Effect Plantago Asiatica L. Extract
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate acute effect Plantago asiatica L. extract consumption antioxidative biomarkers subject mild hyperlipidemia . Subjects intake Plantago asiatica L. extract high fat meal oxidative stress loading . Antioxidative biomarkers measure single-dose administration Plantago asiatica L. extract .
DOC.criteria: Adults age 30 BMI ( Body mass index ) 25 33 kg/m2 Total cholesterol 200mg/dL 250mg/dL OR Triglyceride 150mg/dL 220mg/dL OR LDLcholesterol 130mg/dL 165mg/dL Subject take part clinical trial within 30 day screen visit Subject take medicine , Chinese medicine Health/Functional Foods affect antioxidative biomarkers within 30days screen visit Subject pregnant breast feeding Subject lose body weight 4kg within 30days screen visit Alcoholic Smoker Subject take excessive exercise ( 7hours/week ) Subject hypertension ( ≥140/90mmHg ) , diabetes ( fast blood glucose ≥126mg/dL ) , kidney disease , hepatic disease hyperthyroidism within 2years Subject allergy ingredient study product
